scripts.build-ios: echo '.env.prod' > /tmp/envfile && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output iOS/main.jsbundle
scripts.build-android: echo '.env.prod' > /tmp/envfile && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/main.jsbundle
